text: James Martin Munley (June 28, 1936 â€“ March 22, 2020)Profile of James Martin Munley was an American politician and lawyer. He was born in Scranton, Pennsylvania. He was a United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Middle District of Pennsylvania from 1998 to 2009. after being nominated by President Bill Clinton. Munley died on March 22, 2020, aged 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Scranton, Pennsylvania Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: James Martin Munley
